text: qtalkm -ayha almwmnwn- lilmushrikin fi alshahr aldhy hrram allah alqital fih hu jaza'an lqtalhm lakum fi alshahr alhram. waladhi yetdy ealaa ma harram allah min almakan walzman, yeaqb bimithl felh, wamin jns eamalihi. faman aietadaa ealaykum balqtal 'aw ghyrh fanzlu bih euqubat mumathilat ljnayth, wala haraj ealaykum fi dhlk; li'anahum hum albadywn baledwan, wkhafu allah fala ttjawzu almmathlt fi aleqwbt, waelamuu 'ana allah mae aladhin ytqwnh wytyewnh bi'ada' fraydh watajanub mharmh
